org.jgentleframework.core.reflection
Class ReflectIdentification

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.core.reflection.ReflectIdentification

public abstract class ReflectIdentification
extends java.lang.Object

The Reflect class is an abstract class representing some of static methods designating to be used conjointly with ObjectBindingConstant in order to perform annotating operations.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

Method Detail

clazz

public static Identification<java.lang.Class<?>> clazz()
Returns a class identification that corresponds to configuration data of configuration data.

Returns:
Identification

fields

public static Identification<java.lang.reflect.Field> fields(java.lang.String name)
Returns a FieldIdentification that corresponds to the object class which is specified in configuration data.

Performance of this method is the same as fields(String, boolean) with boolean value of 'foundOnSuperclass' is specified to be false. This denotes that the returned field list only includes field objects are declared in current derived class, exclude super classes of it.

Note:

- This method only returns non-static fields.

- Regular expression can be used in order to specify a set of return fields.

EX:

fields("str*") shall specify all of returned fields must have prefix is 'str' or

fields("?method") shall specify all of returned field objects must have name which begun with one word and 'method' string at last.

Parameters:
name - the name (or regular expression pattern) of field or a set of fields.
Returns:
returns an Identification object containing identified data of fields.

fields

public static Identification<java.lang.reflect.Field> fields(java.lang.String name,
                                                             boolean foundOnSuperclass)
Returns a FieldIdentification that corresponds to the object class which is specified in current configuration data.

Note:

- This method only returns non-static fields.

- Regular expression can be used in order to specify a set of return fields.

EX:

fields("str*") shall specify all of returned fields must have prefix is 'str' or

fields("?method") shall specify all of returned field objects must have name which begun with one word and 'method' string at last.

Parameters:
name - the name (or regular expression pattern) of field or a set of fields.
foundOnSuperclass - if is specified to be true, the returned field list will includes field objects are declared in current derived class and also in super class of it. Otherwise, if is specified to be false, the returned field list only includes field objects are declared in current derived class, exclude super classes of it.
Returns:
returns an Identification object containing identified data of fields.

methods

public static MethodIdentification methods(java.lang.String name)
Returns a MethodIdentification that corresponds to the object class which is specified in configuration data.

This method performance is the same as methods(String, boolean) with boolean value of 'foundOnSuperclass' is specified to be false. This denotes that the returned fields list only includes field objects are declared in current derived class, exclude super classes of it.

Note:

- This method only returns non-static methods.

- Regular expression can be used in order to specify a set of returned methods.

EX:

methods("set*") shall specify to return all of setter methods.

Parameters:
name - the name (or regular expression pattern) of method or a set of methods.
Returns:
returns an Identification object containing identified data of methods.

                                           boolean foundOnSuperclass)
Returns a MethodIdentification that corresponds to the object class which is specified in configuration data.

Note:

- This method only returns non-static methods.

- Regular expression can be used in order to specify a set of returned methods.

EX:

method("set*") shall specify to return all of setter methods.

Parameters:
name - the name (or regular expression pattern) of method or a set of methods.
foundOnSuperclass - if is specified to be true, the returned method list includes method objects are declared in current derived class and also in super class of it. Otherwise, if is specified to be false, the returned method list only includes method objects are declared in current derived class, exclude super classes of it.
Returns:
returns an Identification object containing identified data of methods.
